name: RetroRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: retro radio
des: Retro Radio, your ultimate destination for a nostalgic musical journey! Tune in on the Alexa app for a timeless experience filled with the greatest hits from the golden era. Immerse yourself in the classic sounds of the '60s, '70s, and '80s, curated to bring back cherished memories. Our live DJs transport you back to the days when radio was king, adding a personal touch to each track. Whether you're reliving the magic of Motown, rocking to iconic tunes, or swaying to timeless ballads, Retro Radio is your go-to station for vintage vibes. Discover the soundtrack of yesteryears with Alexa, where the past comes alive in every note. Press play and let the nostalgia flow!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
